name: dale-chall
description: List of familiar American-English words: The New Dale-Chall (1995)
author: Titus Wormer <tituswormer@gmail.com>

scripts.test-travis: node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover node_modules/.bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- --reporter spec --check-leaks -u exports spec/dale-chall.spec.js
scripts.lint: npm run lint-api && npm run lint-test && npm run lint-style
scripts.lint-api: node_modules/.bin/eslint index.js script/scrape-data.js script/build-data.js script/build-supported-words.js --env node --env browser --rule 'quotes: [2, single]'
scripts.lint-style: node_modules/.bin/jscs index.js script/scrape-data.js script/build-data.js script/build-supported-words.js spec/dale-chall.spec.js --reporter=inline
scripts.prepublish: npm run scrape-data && npm run build-data && npm run build-supported-words
scripts.make: npm run lint && npm run coverage
